description: This file defines a Babel plugin for JSX transformation that adds metadata to elements, including functions for analyzing expressions, tracing prop sources, and detecting portal components within React code. It includes caching mechanisms and recursive analysis for cross-file component and prop tracking.

methods.name: resolveImportPath
methods.description: Resolves the absolute path of an import source, considering project-specific aliases and extensions.

methods.name: getComponentSourcePath
methods.description: Gets the source file path of a component binding, returns null if in the same file.

methods.name: parseFileAst
methods.description: Parses a file into an AST with caching based on modification time.

methods.name: jsxNameOf
methods.description: Extracts the name of a JSX element from an opening element.

methods.name: isPortalishName
methods.description: Checks if a name matches portal-related suffixes or is in a set of radix roots.

methods.name: isStaticLiteralExpression
methods.description: Determines if an expression is a static literal (string, number, boolean, null, or template literal without expressions).

methods.name: buildDynamicExpressionWrapper
methods.description: Wraps a JSX child in a span with metadata attributes for dynamic expressions.

methods.name: wrapDynamicExpressionChildren
methods.description: Replaces dynamic expressions in JSX children with wrapped versions.

methods.name: fileExportHasPortals
methods.description: Recursively checks if an exported component in a file contains portal elements, with caching.

methods.name: usageIsCompositePortal
methods.description: Determines if a JSX element is a composite portal component based on its name and source.

methods.name: analyzeExpression
methods.description: Analyzes a JSX expression to determine its source type and traceability.

methods.name: analyzeIdentifier
methods.description: Analyzes an identifier to determine if it is a prop, state, external, or static value.

methods.name: analyzeMemberExpression
methods.description: Analyzes member expressions like item.name or obj.prop.

methods.name: buildPropertyPath
methods.description: Builds a dot notation string from a member expression.

methods.name: getJSXElementName
methods.description: Gets the name of a JSX element.

methods.name: getContainingComponentName
methods.description: Finds the name of the component containing a given expression.

methods.name: tracePropToSource
methods.description: Traces a prop back to its source, either within the same file or cross-file.

methods.name: recordPropSources
methods.description: Records prop source info for cross-file prop tracing.

methods.name: lookupCrossFilePropSource
methods.description: Looks up cached prop source info from other files.

methods.name: lazyEvaluatePropSource
methods.description: Lazily evaluates prop source info by scanning cached ASTs.

methods.name: getArrayIterationContext
methods.description: Detects if inside an array iteration (.map, etc.) and extracts context info.
